summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: DeepDream Portable Electric Nail Drill - Professional Efile Nail Drill Kit For Acrylic, Gel Nails, Manicure Pedicure Polishing Shape Tools with 11Pcs Nail Drill Bits and 36 Sanding Bands
Review Date: 2020/08/02
Store: Deep Dream
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Deep Dream', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Maximum Rotational Speed': '20000 RPM', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 4 x 2.6 inches; 10.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '191762584966', 'Manufacturer': 'Deep Dream'}
Review Text: Just used the deep dream electric nail drill.  Love it, I will not use nail files again! Loved that it has a speed control where it can be slow to very fast for acrylic nails. It worked great on my natural nails. Will definitely keep using it!
Review Title: Works fantastic! No more nail file for me!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: VOOADA Electric for Face, Arm, Waist, Belly, Leg, Hip
Review Date: 2020/10/03
Store: VOOADA
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 7.87 x 2.05 inches; 1.37 Pounds', 'UPC': '699936288523'}
Review Text: Great nail set! At first I thought it didn't come with any attachments, but they're actually on the bottom!
Review Title: Easy to use!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Fog-free Dental Mirror and 4 Pieces of Stainless Steel Dental Pick Professional Oral Care Kit for Family including Dogs Oral Care
Review Date: 2021/03/23
Store: Sunrise glow
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.15 x 2.4 x 1.3 inches; 4.23 Ounces'}
Review Text: The tools are exactly what you'd expect. I really just wanted this pack for the mirror. Well, I got it and now I realize I need to make a dental appointment! In all seriousness, the mirror works okay but after I pulled the protective plastic cover off it started to scratch badly. Don't know why.
Review Title: Okay
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Plant Therapy Natural Acetone Free Nail Polish Remover 6 fl oz One Touch Dispensing Bottle with Flip Top Cap Tropical Flower Scent
Review Date: 2021/04/07
Store: Plant Therapy
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Plant Therapy', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Weight': '6.24 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '6 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 2.2 x 2.2 inches; 6.24 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912056168'}
Review Text: Smells great and works! Doesn't burn like regular nail polish does
Review Title: Works well!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Oval Large Makeup Brushes Fast Application Liquid Cream Powder Foundation (Rose Gold 1)
Review Date: 2021/04/08
Store: LAMJAD
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LAMJAD', 'Material': 'synthetic', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 3.07 x 1.61 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'UPC': '714403137835'}
Review Text: I didn't even get to use this brush I was so disappointed. As I was trying to remove the tape around the plastic covering the handle snapped in half.
Review Title: Broke immediately
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Blue Sage De-Puffing Caffeine Eye Serum | Natural Anti-Aging Eye Treatment with Probiotics, Green Tea + Hyaluronic Acid Serum for Face to Tighten and Hydrate under Eye Skin, and Brighten Dark Circles
Review Date: 2021/04/18
Store: Blue Sage
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.06 x 1.65 x 1.42 inches; 4.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '860004070450', 'Manufacturer': 'Blue Sage Skin Co'}
Review Text: I couldn't use this product at all. Any time I tried to apply to my under eye it would burn really badly. I would have to immediately wipe it off. I always used a clean face when I applied this and it still burned.
Review Title: Burned and I couldn't use
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Black Wolf - Men’s Ultra Hydrating Moisturizer - 1.7 Fl Oz – Soothe Dry, Patchy & Flaky Areas on your Skin - Fast Absorbing Formula Won't Feel Heavy or Greasy - Sulfate Free for Dry Skin
Review Date: 2021/04/21
Store: Black Wolf
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Black Wolf', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '5.39 x 3.15 x 1.46 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BLKWLF_MOIST_DRY', 'UPC': '850021340087'}
Review Text: I like to use this moisturizer after I use the Black Wolf charcoal mask. It helps moisturize my skin and calm it afterwards. It's not greasy and moisturizes really well. It has a light scent that isn't too strong. I've been using this moisturizer for a while now and it hasn't caused any breakouts or dry spots. Really good product!
Review Title: Smells nice, moisturizes, works well after black mask use
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lip Liner Set 12 Colors Natural Lip Liner Makeup Pencil Long Lasting Matte Velvet Lip Liner
Review Date: 2021/04/21
Store: Marine Forest
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Velvet', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 2.28 x 0.94 inches; 2.24 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843697955'}
Review Text: I tried each one of these lip liners and they are not true to the colors on the pencils. I like how vibrant the colors are and how smoothly the liner goes on. Paired with a lipstick, they look really nice and work well. I just wish that the color was accurate. Other than that, great product!
Review Title: Pretty colors, not accurate
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2Pcs Mascara Black Volume and Length 4D Natural and Long Lasting Lash Blast Mascara, 0.27 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2021/04/25
Store: Marine Forest
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.01 x 0.98 inches; 3.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843907382'}
Review Text: I am very impressed with this mascara! It goes on very smoothly and creates a very pretty, long and bold lash. The mascara itself feels light on my lashes and dries quickly.
Review Title: Very pretty, long bold lashes
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: KXAMELIE Nude Pink Press on Nails with White Stripe Designs Glossy Full Cover Medium Short Fake Nails Glue on Nails Tips stick on nails for Women Girls Finger Manicure 24 PCS
Review Date: 2021/04/25
Store: KXAMELIE
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Size': '24 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'KXAMELIE', 'Style': 'French', 'Pattern': 'Striped', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 4.09 x 0.63 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '749212759923'}
Review Text: These nails are really pretty and have a great variety of colors. They are fairly long but I like that. I can cut and file them to size. These nails come with many different sizes guaranteeing the right fit for everyone. My daughter used these nails with some nail decals and applied a clear gel top coat to get them to look shiny. They are great quality and I love them!
Review Title: Easy to use, pretty, variety of color
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lavender Foot Peel Mask 2 Pcs for Softing Smoothing Feet,Peeling Away Calluses and Dead Skin CellsExfoliating Foot Mask,Repair Rough Heels,Get Silky Feet
Review Date: 2021/04/28
Store: BOOSCA
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BOOSCA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing,Nourish', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.24 x 0.47 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '783103348421'}
Review Text: I didn't think this would work but it does! It definitely makes your feet peel and after it's all done they are baby smooth. I followed the instructions and my feet peeled for approximately a week. After they were done peeling I gave myself a home pedicure because it didn't take off EVERY callus but it did well enough that they were soooo smooth afterwards. My feet are summer time ready!
Review Title: Really works, super soft feet
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Shopping Preferences:**

- **Nail Care**: Strong preference for electric nail tools and products that enhance manicure and pedicure experiences. High satisfaction with some products, indicating a commitment to effective and essential nail care items.

- **Dental Hygiene**: Interest in oral care products, although experiences have been mixed, indicating a focus on practical and efficient dental tools.

- **Makeup & Beauty**: Investments in makeup tools and products, particularly for eyes and lips, showcasing a desire for aesthetically pleasing and effective cosmetics. Experiences with some products have varied, indicating a search for reliable makeup options.

- **Skin Care**: Enthusiasm for moisturizing and anti-aging products, with a preference for non-greasy formulations. Positive feedback on moisturizers suggests a commitment to skin health.

- **Foot Care**: Engagement with foot care solutions, especially exfoliating products that deliver visible results. This indicates a preference for self-care products that yield effective outcomes.

- **Package Dimensions & User Experience**: Attention to product dimensions and user-friendly features, favoring items that are easy to use and store.

Overall, this individual demonstrates a keen interest in personal grooming, self-care, and beauty maintenance, valuing both efficiency and results across various product categories.

target_interaction.title: Natural looking, good size variety, stays on
target_interaction.text: I love these! They're super easy to use. The liner goes on smooth and the lashes adhere without much effort. They stay on all day and I don't have to worry about the edges coming up. The removal is super easy and I love that the lashes are reusable. All in all, a great product I have used multiple times and am not disappointed!
target_interaction.title_meta: Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit,10 Pairs Eyelashes Magnetic 2021 Upgraded 3D Fluffy Natural Waterproof Reusable Fox Eyes Kit False Eyelashes And Eyeliner.
features: ❤️【MAGNETIC EYELASHES WITH EYELINER】This magnetic eyeliner and lashes kit comes with a special eyeliner that contains ultra-fine magnetic particles that allow the magnetic eyelash to easily connect. Whatever you want a natural look or fashion dramatic look.It fit your needs for different occasion.

❤️【EASY TO USE】The magnetic eyeliner and eyelash set are easier to use than traditional eyelashes.You just need to do your makeup as usual.Applying magnetic eyeliner on upper eyelid and put the magnetic eyelashes in the same position on the skin.If you do not want to go the full mile and want to just do a little bit and yet get the complete look, then just simply apply magnetic eyelashes and a little magnetic eyeliner.

❤️【NO GLUE&NO UNNECESSARY】There is no glue to use.You don't need to worry about the glue embarrasing or fallimg off.If you have only 15 minutes before a night out, alongside false lashes and lipstick, this little can could be an essential part of your pre-party rescue kit.

❤️【WATERPROOF BUT EASY REMOVE】The magnetic eyeliner is waterproof,as well as hypoallergenic if you have sensitive skin.You can take it go to a tear-jerking movie even swimming.Gently remove all make-up with make-up remover towelettes or a cotton pad soaked with remover towelettes or eye makeup remover.

❤️【HIGH QUALITY PROMISE】We can assure you that all of the magnetic eyelashes and eyeliner is new. And we promise that each eyelashes kit is good quality.The ingredient is safe and permission to use.If you have any problem contact with us, we will try our best to make you satisfied.
